About us

At our beginning in 2012, our core business was the hosting of teamspeak servers for online gamers and the hosting of their team's website. Since 2015, we have expanded our shared hosting activities to the general public. Since we have also gained experience in dedicated servers through our activities in the hosting of teamspeak servers, we also extended our sector of activity in the VPS hosting.

We have always been dedicated to price-quality ratio and our main goal is to provide quality services for those on a low budget. We believe that the web should remain cheap and accessible to everyones. It is really important for us that our customers do not feel as if they are just a number.
